meanings.sent1: During the parade, the bannerette fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The knight carried a bannerette with his family crest.
meanings.sent3: The bannerette decided to play hide-and-seek with the other flags.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a colorful bannerette lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The bannerette stood proudly at the entrance, welcoming guests with its bright colors.

meanings.definition: A small banner used as a standard or ensign.
meanings.sent1: The bannerette marked the beginning of the race.
meanings.sent2: The army marched forward under the bannerette of their kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the bannerette and ran up the tree.
meanings.sent4: The bannerette of hope waved bravely in the stormy sky.
meanings.sent5: The bannerette flapped vigorously, leading the way through the dense forest.
